item.title: Hucclecote War Memorial Tidy Up in advance of Remembrance Sunday, 28th October
item.description:
We are approaching Remembrance Sunday, a very significant date on the Hucclecote calendar, as plans to parade along Hucclecote Rd to the War Memorial at the junction with Green Lane take shape. Each year more and more local groups attend to lay a wreath, or just to be part of this special day. Wreaths will be laid on behalf of the City Council and the County Council with hundreds of residents in attendance. The area has been fairly well maintained during the year and that is much appreciated. Could you please ensure that the vegetation in the immediate area is given a final ‘trim’ so that the Hucclecote War Memorial is looking its best on Armistice Day and Remembrance Sunday?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
